help-file.title: "SPIRIT JUMP"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> & <player> or <mob> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Spiritual
"Spirit Jump" causes the spirit of the caster to instantly leap a short distance to another living being and pulls the caster's body along for the ride. The distance that the Shaman can travel is level dependent.
